title: Surface events/highlights in report.html/report.json
scope: Update report.json to include an events/highlights section with counts and links.
Update report.html to display events and highlight clip links (when present).
Explain confidence and missing-ball limitations clearly.
acceptance: Report surfaces list candidate shots/goals with timestamps and confidence.
When highlight clips exist, report links them using relative bundle paths.
Report remains deterministic and does not claim certainty when confidence is low.

deliverables.title: Report integration for events and highlights
acceptance: HTML report renders events and highlight links deterministically.

subtasks.title: Add events/highlights section to report outputs.
